title: Bitcoin
text_content: Bitcoin is a decentralized digital currency that can be transferred on the peer-to-peer bitcoin network.

title: Ethereum
text_content: Ethereum is a decentralized platform that enables smart contracts and decentralized applications (dApps) to be built and run without any downtime.

title: Litecoin
text_content: Litecoin is a peer-to-peer cryptocurrency and open-source software project released under the MIT/X11 license.
